mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_content, email, camp_id, review_image, review_point, review_like, review_date) VALUES (#{reviewContent}, #{email}, #{campId}, #{reviewImage}, #{reviewPoint}, #{reviewLike}, #{reviewDate})
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, C.camp_name FROM review R LEFT JOIN camping C ON R.camp_id = C.camp_id ORDER BY review_no DESC;

SELECT R.email, R.review_content, R.review_image, R.review_point, R.review_like, C.camp_name FROM review R LEFT JOIN camping C ON R.camp_id = C.camp_id ORDER BY review_like DESC, review_date DESC LIMIT 1
